name: GBall (GabyZero)
description:
Mini-game made in 2 days for the GBJam9. Do your best to put the balls on the targets. Controls : Gameboy controlIn Game controlsDescriptionPadWASD / ↑→↓←Move the cursorASpacebarValidate your choice / Place the block
BShiftRemove a blockHolding BHolding shiftRemove all blocksStartEnterLaunch / Stop the ballsSelectCOpen the selection menu
